critique:
This document establishes a code of fair competition for the smelting and refining of secondary metals. 

1. Ideological Tilt: The National Industrial Recovery Act is generally considered a liberal piece of legislation as it involved government intervention in the economy. Therefore, I will score this as a +3.
2. Immigration Approach: This document does not address immigration, so I will score it as a 0.
3. Executive Power: This document is an executive order, but it is based on existing legislation. It expands executive power to approve codes of fair competition, so I will score it as a +2.
4. Federalism: The document centralizes power at the federal level, so I will score it as a +3.
5. National Security vs. Civil Liberties: This document does not address national security or civil liberties, so I will score it as a 0.
6. Economic Regulation: This document promotes government intervention in the economy, so I will score it as a +4.
7. Social Inclusion: This document does not address social inclusion, so I will score it as a 0.
